function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of collaboration and integration in smart city environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unpreparedness of response","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate utilization of urban insights for governance","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient actionable
